title: buff pirates
body:
make it 2/4 brakpoint
2 giving 0-3 gold
4 giving 1-4 gold or chance to drop  treasure(neekos help , rank 1 champion, maybe item)

replies.body: This totally makes sense to me, except maybe less of a bonus for 2 pirates.  With a tier 1 and 2, it's too easy to get to drop that much gold.  Considering 4 pirates would require a tier 5, though, it makes sense that it would give more than it currently does.
What pirate would be needed that's t5? You get 4 from the basic ones, highest being t3..  Pyke t2, graves t1, gp t3, tf t2..

Woops, you're 100% right.  I totally forgot about TF.  Maybe they could make the pirate buff 3/5, instead of 2/4?  Otherwise it's still very possible and easy to get 4.

Yeah pirates are useless...times i get 1 gold each round, times i get boots or fish bones most others....

buff pirates...

nerf glacial...

My last game I started with pirates and ate a loss streak to try and stack gold early.
Multiple rounds in a row, got 0 gold chests.

For 3 pirates with no other synergy (Excluding gunslinger if you live long enough to find a Miss Fortune), I should *at least* get 1 gold per round.

I wouldn't give Pirates items since that'd be insane but the breakpoints make sense.  Pirates offer nothing in combat so having more rewards for going for less synergies would make Pirates more rewarding.  It'd also make pirates more popular if you only need a couple gunslingers to invest in them.
